014package org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.search;
015
016import java.util.Date;
017import java.util.Optional;
018import java.util.UUID;
019import io.swagger.v3.oas.annotations.media.Schema;
020
021import org.gbif.api.annotation.Experimental;
022import org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.Pageable;
023import org.gbif.api.model.common.search.FacetedSearchRequest;
024import org.gbif.api.util.IsoDateInterval;
025import org.gbif.api.vocabulary.BasisOfRecord;
026import org.gbif.api.vocabulary.Continent;
027import org.gbif.api.vocabulary.Country;
028import org.gbif.api.vocabulary.MediaType;
029import org.gbif.api.vocabulary.OccurrenceIssue;
030import org.gbif.api.vocabulary.OccurrenceStatus;
031
032/** Request class for issuing search request to the occurrence search service. */
033public class OccurrenceSearchRequest extends FacetedSearchRequest<OccurrenceSearchParameter> {
034
035  @Schema(
036    description = "This flag enables the use of case-sensitive matches and aggregations on certain search parameters."
037  )
038  private Boolean matchCase;
039
040  @Schema(
041    description = "This flag allows to sort the results in a random order by specifying a seed. The seed makes the " +
042      "random results reproducible so we can use paging. The same seed has to be sent for each page."
043  )
044  private String shuffle;
045
046  public OccurrenceSearchRequest() {
047    // empty block
048    super();
049  }
050
051  /**
052   * This flag enables the use of case-sensitive matches and aggregations on certain search
053   * parameters.
054   *
055   * <p>Fields that support this feature are: occurrenceId, recordedBy, samplingProtocol,
056   * catalogNumber, collectionCode, institutionCode, eventId, parentEventId, waterBody,
057   * stateProvince, recordNumber, identifiedBy, organismId and locality.
058   *
059   * <p>This is an experimental feature and its implementation may change or be removed at any time.
060   *
061   * <p>Be aware that this is not a per-field flag, all possible fields will match case sensitively.
062   */
063  @Experimental
064  public Boolean isMatchCase() {
065    return Optional.ofNullable(matchCase).orElse(Boolean.FALSE);
066  }
067
068  @Experimental
069  public void setMatchCase(Boolean matchCase) {
070    this.matchCase = matchCase;
071  }
072
073  /**
074   * This flag allows to sort the results in a random order by specifying a seed. The seed makes the
075   * random results reproducible so we can use paging. The same seed has to be sent for each page.
076   */
077  @Experimental
078  public String getShuffle() {
079    return shuffle;
080  }
081
082  @Experimental
083  public void setShuffle(String shuffle) {
084    this.shuffle = shuffle;
085  }
086
087
088  public OccurrenceSearchRequest(long offset, int limit) {
089    super(offset, limit);
090  }
091
092  public OccurrenceSearchRequest(Pageable page) {
093    super(page);
094  }
095
096  public void addOccurrenceIDFilter(String occurrenceID) {
097    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.OCCURRENCE_ID, occurrenceID);
098  }
099
100  public void addEstablishmentMeansFilter(String establishmentMeans) {
101    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.ESTABLISHMENT_MEANS, establishmentMeans);
102  }
103
104  public void addBasisOfRecordFilter(BasisOfRecord basisOfRecord) {
105    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.BASIS_OF_RECORD, basisOfRecord);
106  }
107
108  public void addTypeStatusFilter(String typeStatus) {
109    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.TYPE_STATUS, typeStatus);
110  }
111
112  public void addCatalogNumberFilter(String catalogNumber) {
113    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.CATALOG_NUMBER, catalogNumber);
114  }
115
116  public void addRecordedByFilter(String collectorName) {
117    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.RECORDED_BY, collectorName);
118  }
119
120  public void addIdentifiedByFilter(String collectorName) {
121    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.IDENTIFIED_BY, collectorName);
122  }
123
124  public void addRecordNumberFilter(String recordNumber) {
125    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.RECORD_NUMBER, recordNumber);
126  }
127
128  public void addCountryFilter(Country country) {
129    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.COUNTRY, country.getIso2LetterCode());
130  }
131
132  public void addContinentFilter(Continent continent) {
133    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.CONTINENT, continent);
134  }
135
136  public void addDatasetKeyFilter(UUID datasetKey) {
137    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.DATASET_KEY, datasetKey.toString());
138  }
139
140  public void addGeometryFilter(String geometryAsWkt) {
141    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOMETRY, geometryAsWkt);
142  }
143
144  public void addDecimalLatitudeFilter(double latitude) {
145    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.DECIMAL_LATITUDE, latitude);
146  }
147
148  public void addDecimalLongitudeFilter(double longitude) {
149    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.DECIMAL_LONGITUDE, longitude);
150  }
151
152  public void addCoordinateUncertaintyInMetersFilter(double uncertainty) {
153    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.COORDINATE_UNCERTAINTY_IN_METERS, uncertainty);
154  }
155
156  public void addMonthFilter(int month) {
157    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.MONTH, month);
158  }
159
160  public void addDayFilter(int day) {
161    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.DAY, day);
162  }
163
164  public void addTaxonKeyFilter(int taxonKey) {
165    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY, taxonKey);
166  }
167
168  public void addKingdomKeyFilter(int kingdomKey) {
169    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.KINGDOM_KEY, kingdomKey);
170  }
171
172  public void addPhylumKeyFilter(int phylumKey) {
173    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.PHYLUM_KEY, phylumKey);
174  }
175
176  public void addClassKeyFilter(int classKey) {
177    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.CLASS_KEY, classKey);
178  }
179
180  public void addOrderKeyFilter(int orderKey) {
181    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.ORDER_KEY, orderKey);
182  }
183
184  public void addFamilyKeyFilter(int familyKey) {
185    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.FAMILY_KEY, familyKey);
186  }
187
188  public void addGenusKeyFilter(int genusKey) {
189    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GENUS_KEY, genusKey);
190  }
191
192  public void addSubGenusKeyFilter(int subGenusKey) {
193    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.SUBGENUS_KEY, subGenusKey);
194  }
195
196  public void addSpeciesKeyFilter(int speciesKey) {
197    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.SPECIES_KEY, speciesKey);
198  }
199
200  public void addYearFilter(int year) {
201    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.YEAR, year);
202  }
203
204  public void addEventDateFilter(IsoDateInterval date) {
205    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, date);
206  }
207
208  public void addLastInterpretedFilter(Date modified) {
209    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.LAST_INTERPRETED, modified);
210  }
211
212  public void addPublishingCountryFilter(Country country) {
213    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.PUBLISHING_COUNTRY, country.getIso2LetterCode());
214  }
215
216  public void addInstitutionCodeFilter(String code) {
217    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.INSTITUTION_CODE, code);
218  }
219
220  public void addHasCoordinateFilter(boolean hasCoordinate) {
221    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.HAS_COORDINATE, hasCoordinate);
222  }
223
224  public void addSpatialIssueFilter(boolean hasSpatialIssue) {
225    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.HAS_GEOSPATIAL_ISSUE, hasSpatialIssue);
226  }
227
228  public void addIssueFilter(OccurrenceIssue issue) {
229    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE, issue);
230  }
231
232  public void addElevationFilter(double elevation) {
233    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.ELEVATION, elevation);
234  }
235
236  public void addMediaTypeFilter(MediaType mediaType) {
237    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.MEDIA_TYPE, mediaType);
238  }
239
240  public void addRecordedByIdsFilter(String recordedByIds) {
241    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.RECORDED_BY_ID, recordedByIds);
242  }
243
244  public void addIdentifiedByIdsFilter(String identifiedByIds) {
245    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.IDENTIFIED_BY_ID, identifiedByIds);
246  }
247
248  public void addOccurrenceStatusFilter(OccurrenceStatus occurrenceStatus) {
249    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.OCCURRENCE_STATUS, occurrenceStatus);
250  }
251
252  public void addGadmGidFilter(String gadmGid) {
253    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_GID, gadmGid);
254  }
255
256  public void addGadmLevel0GidFilter(String gadm0) {
257    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_LEVEL_0_GID, gadm0);
258  }
259
260  public void addGadmLevel1GidFilter(String gadm1) {
261    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_LEVEL_1_GID, gadm1);
262  }
263
264  public void addGadmLevel2GidFilter(String gadm2) {
265    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_LEVEL_2_GID, gadm2);
266  }
267
268  public void addGadmLevel3GidFilter(String gadm3) {
269    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_LEVEL_3_GID, gadm3);
270  }
271
272  public void addGeologicalTimeFilter(String geologicalTimeConcept) {
273    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOLOGICAL_TIME, geologicalTimeConcept);
274  }
275
276  public void addLithostratigraphyFilter(String lithostratigraphy) {
277    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.LITHOSTRATIGRAPHY, lithostratigraphy);
278  }
279
280  public void addBiostratigraphyFilter(String biostratigraphy) {
281    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.BIOSTRATIGRAPHY, biostratigraphy);
282  }
283
284  @Experimental
285  public void addInstitutionKeyFilter(String institutionKey) {
286    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.INSTITUTION_KEY, institutionKey);
287  }
288
289  @Experimental
290  public void addCollectionKeyFilter(String collectionKey) {
291    addParameter(OccurrenceSearchParameter.COLLECTION_KEY, collectionKey);
292  }
293}
